changelog:
### Iconify v6.9.0 has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __Enhancements:__
    - Resolved black, white, and fluid theme issues for Android 14 QPR3
    - Corrected date format, alignments and behaviors of quick settings and lockscreen clocks

- __Quick Settings:__
    - Added Oneplus style quick settings panel (android 14)
    - Correctly shown header clock in landscape mode (android 14)

- __Depth Wallpaper:__
    - Added MLKit-based subject extraction for dynamic depth wallpaper (android 14) (thanks to @siavash79)
    - Allow using custom depth wallpapers if MLKit is unavailable

- __Lockscreen:__
    - Added lockscreen weather (thanks to @DHD2280 and @omnirom)
    - Added lockscreen widgets (thanks to @DHD2280 and @risingTechOSS)
    - Allow changing user name and device name for lockscreen clocks
    - Allow disabling quick settings panel on secured lockscreen
    - Changed lockscreen clock style 10

- __Background Chip:__
    - Added advance customizations for statusbar clock chip
    - Removed status icons chip for android 14 as it became buggy

- __Volume Panel:__
    - Added option to fix invisible ringer icon when using volume module

- __Statusbar:__
    - Added custom statusbar clock size

- __Other:__
    - Remove fingerprint icon from icon packs
    - Numerous other improvements and bug fixes

## App Changes:
- Bump AGP and dependencies
- Updated translations (thanks to all the contributors on [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/iconify))
- And many more improvements...

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
